title: Smart Data Models - Discrete
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Discrete represents a discrete Measurement, i.e. a Measurement representing discrete values, e.g. a Breaker position.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be Discrete

DiscreteValues.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Measurement to which this value is connected. Default: 'list'

ValueAliasSet.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The ValueAliasSet used for translation of a MeasurementValue.value to a name. Default: None
